about_the_game:
The game "Kukuevo" in the genre of "visual novel" was created by a team of 2 people.

An ordinary office clerk named Dima has a terrible (for him) day and quits his job. Unable to come up with anything better, our main character decides to run away from the routine to the village where he used to visit his grandmother as a child. The village hides many secrets and puzzles that need to be solved. The main character begins to get to know the locals and explore their stories.



In the visual novel "Kukuevo", the player immerses themselves in the world of a mysterious village, which becomes the main storyline of the game. This story has all the elements to captivate the player's imagination: mysterious creatures, loyal friends, first love, and many endings.

The game features different types of mysterious creatures that inhabit the village - from friendly and playful to hidden and dangerous. The hero interacts with them, learns their stories, and becomes a mediator between worlds.

At the same time, the main character meets old friends who help him on his journey through the village. Together, they confront evil and try to protect the village of Kukuevo and its inhabitants.



One of the main elements of the plot is the hero's childhood first love. The hero meets a beautiful girl who is involved in the events of the village.

The game has many plot development options and 9 endings, which allows you to influence the outcomes of the story and play the game multiple times, receiving new emotional and informational discoveries.

The game "Kukuevo" provides a unique opportunity to get to know the bright characters, puzzles, and mysteries of a mysterious village.
detailed_description:
Our new game


About the Game



The game "Kukuevo" in the genre of "visual novel" was created by a team of 2 people.

An ordinary office clerk named Dima has a terrible (for him) day and quits his job. Unable to come up with anything better, our main character decides to run away from the routine to the village where he used to visit his grandmother as a child. The village hides many secrets and puzzles that need to be solved. The main character begins to get to know the locals and explore their stories.



In the visual novel "Kukuevo", the player immerses themselves in the world of a mysterious village, which becomes the main storyline of the game. This story has all the elements to captivate the player's imagination: mysterious creatures, loyal friends, first love, and many endings.

The game features different types of mysterious creatures that inhabit the village - from friendly and playful to hidden and dangerous. The hero interacts with them, learns their stories, and becomes a mediator between worlds.

At the same time, the main character meets old friends who help him on his journey through the village. Together, they confront evil and try to protect the village of Kukuevo and its inhabitants.



One of the main elements of the plot is the hero's childhood first love. The hero meets a beautiful girl who is involved in the events of the village.

The game has many plot development options and 9 endings, which allows you to influence the outcomes of the story and play the game multiple times, receiving new emotional and informational discoveries.

The game "Kukuevo" provides a unique opportunity to get to know the bright characters, puzzles, and mysteries of a mysterious village.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

name: Кукуево / Kukuevo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

short_description: Kukuevo is a unique experience for those who are into mystery stories and love visual novels. Get ready for an exciting adventure in a world of mysteries and mysteries where every step you take can determine the outcome of the game.
